text: Gei goodou gu iloo di madau hagahuaidu mo haga balumee i lodo Philippi, i mua di madau lloo adu gi godou baahi i Thessalonica. Ma e aha maa gimaadou guu dau gi lodo di hai baahi damana, gei tadau God gu hagamaaloo aga gimaadou bolo gi agoago adu gi goodou di Longo Humalia dela mai dono baahi.2.2 Nnegau 16.19-24; 17.1-9
